title: One Bedroom One Bath Available Now! Apply Today!  While Supplies Last!
posting_body: ['Take a Virtual Tour Today!', '<URL>', 'Terra Vista at the Park', '5425 S. Federal Circle, Littleton, CO, 80123', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Welcome to Terra Vista at the Park', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 672 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Terra Vista at the Park offers comfortable apartment living brimming with amenities at an unbeatable Littleton location.', 'These Littleton apartments for rent are conveniently located with easy accessibility to downtown Littleton, the Littleton light rail stop, Santa Fe Drive, and an abundance of outdoor activities.', 'Make yourself at home with our outdoor swimming pool, clubhouse with WiFi, and fitness room for your enjoyment.', 'Our apartments in Littleton include washer and dryer in the home, a balcony or patio, a fireplace, and loads of closet space to fit your lifestyle.', 'Call us today to schedule your tour and make Terra Vista at the Park your next home.', 'Features', '- Washer and dryer included in all floor plans', '- Wood burning fireplaces in all homes', '- Renovated interiors including new appliances, counter tops, cabinets, and wood flooring in the kitchen, bathrooms, and entry', '- Additional storage off of the large patio/balcony', '- Large bedrooms with high speed internet access', 'Community Amenities', '- Clubhouse with WiFi', '- Minutes from Aspen Grove shopping center', '- Swimming Pool', '- Fitness center', '- Onsite management', '- Less than a 5 minute drive to the Downtown Littleton Light Rail Station', '- Conveniently located near Littleton Golf and Tennis Club, Bowles Grove Park, and Mary Carter Greenway Trail', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-4:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Call for policy.', 'hpjtOO1YWZw']
